name: indie-web-for-all
description: A service providing an IndieWeb profile for users without the technical knowledge to maintain their own site.

scripts.start:dev: npm run build:client:dev && npm run build:server:dev && node app/server/index.js
scripts.start:prod: npm run build:client:prod && npm run build:server:prod && node app/server/index.js
scripts.build:server:dev: browserify src/server-entry.js -t [ envify --NODE_ENV development ] -t [ stringify --extensions [.html] ] -t babelify -t vueify --node > app/server/index.js
scripts.build:server:prod: browserify src/server-entry.js -t [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -t [ stringify --extensions [.html] ] -t babelify -t vueify --node > app/server/index.js
scripts.build:client:dev: browserify src/client-entry.js -t [ envify --NODE_ENV development ] -t babelify -t vueify > app/client/index.js
scripts.build:client:prod: browserify src/client-entry.js -t [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -t babelify -t vueify > app/client/index.js

author: Evan Minto (vamptvo@gmail.com)
